prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a round body and strong arms.
Imagine a bipedal creature that specializes in both water and fighting techniques.
Show me a Pokemon that features a spiral pattern on its belly and has a tough demeanor.
Generate a medium-sized Pokemon with blue skin and a determined expression.
Make a character that embodies the spirit of water, with a muscular build and unique patterns.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands, showcasing its aquatic prowess and fighting skills.
